title: Dominic Raab – 2021 Statement on Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Dominic Raab, the Foreign Secretary, on 26 April 2021.
content:
This is a totally inhumane and wholly unjustified decision.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We continue to call on Iran to release Nazanin immediately so she can return to her family in the UK. We continue to do all we can to support her.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
